Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.name: Effect: Aromatic Ammunition
Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.description: The components of this ammunition emit a strong smell when combined during its activation. A creature hit by an activated aromatic ammunition gains a distinct odor for up to 1 hour or until the scent is washed off (requiring at least a gallon of water and 10 minutes of scrubbing). Any creatures within 30 feet smell the target, allowing even those with a weak sense of smell to detect its presence, and all creatures gain a +1 item bonus to Track the affected creature for as long as it has the odor. A creature that has imprecise or precise scent doubles the range at which they can detect the target using their scent compared to the normal range of their scent.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Acid).description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into acid, dealing acid damage instead of its usual damage as well as [[/r {1d6}[persistent,acid]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage} on a critical hit.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Fire).name: Effect: Energized Cartridge (Fire)

Effect: Energizing Rune (Acid).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Acid)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Acid).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 acid damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energizing Rune (Cold).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Cold)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Cold).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 cold damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energizing Rune (Electricity).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Electricity)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Electricity).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 electricity damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energizing Rune (Fire).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Fire)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Fire).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 fire damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energizing Rune (Sonic).name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Sonic)
Effect: Energizing Rune (Sonic).description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 sonic damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater).name: Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 15 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d6 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Lesser).name: Effect: Energy Mutagen (Lesser)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 10 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major).name: Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 10 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d4 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Moderate).name: Effect: Energy Mutagen (Moderate)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 10 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1d4 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Robe of Electricity.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed for 1 minute. (Defaults to 25)

Effect: Energy Robe of Fire.name: Effect: Energy Robe of Fire
Effect: Energy Robe of Fire.description: You gain a +30-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 minute.

Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids.name: Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids
Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids.description: You mentally increase the input of your hearing aids. You gain a +1 item bonus to all hearing-based Perception checks for 10 minutes.

Effect: Euryale (Curse) Card.name: Effect: Euryale (Curse) Card
Effect: Euryale (Curse) Card.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.gmg-srd.jVh90bfsC6w6iVyy]{Euryale (curse)} from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Gyi4IVrAVJRPJF2s]{Deck of Many Things}

Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition.description: For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 1 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Great.description: For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 3 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

Effect: Five-Feather Wreath.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 2 to falling damage.

Effect: Flask of Fellowship.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on your Diplomacy check.

Effect: Frost Vial (Greater).description: The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failu.name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failure)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failu.description: The creature takes a -4 status penalty to Stealth checks for 5 minutes or until it spends a 3-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Stealth checks for 2 minutes or until it spends a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. If the creature was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to visual senses.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Success)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Stealth checks for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to remove the glitter.

Effect: Goggles of Night.description:
Granted by activating @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.K7VHhUamFz3kTnm5]{Goggles of Night}

You gain Darkvision for 1 hour.

Effect: Goggles of Night (Greater).description:
Granted by activating @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Tej30MsQo8Ek9aA6]{Goggles of Night (Greater)}

You gain Darkvision until you rotate the lenses back or the item is no longer invested by you, whichever comes first.

Effect: Goggles of Night (Major).name: Effect: Goggles of Night (Major)
Effect: Goggles of Night (Major).description:
Granted by activating @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.rXXNw6dwVn96giDi]{Goggles of Night (Major)}

You gain greater darkvision, which lasts until you rotate the lenses back or the item is no longer invested by you, whicever comes first.

Effect: Grasp of Droskar.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on all Athletics checks.

Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.name: Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight
Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on your Perception check to Seek or skill check to Recall Knowledge.

Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.name: Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form
Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision and a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Greater Five-Feather Wreath.name: Effect: Greater Five-Feather Wreath
Effect: Greater Five-Feather Wreath.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 5 to falling damage.

Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.name: Effect: Greater Healer's Gel
Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 15 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.name: Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form
Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.description: For the next hour, you gain a +3 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +4 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Grit (Stage 1).name: Effect: Grit (Stage 1)
Effect: Grit (Stage 1).description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Athletics, Crafting, and Performance checks.

Effect: Grit (Stage 2).name: Effect: Grit (Stage 2)
Effect: Grit (Stage 2).description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Athletics, Crafting, and Performance checks, -2 item penalty to Perception checks.

Effect: Grit (Stage 3).name: Effect: Grit (Stage 3)
Effect: Grit (Stage 3).description: The creature takes a -4 item penalty to Perception checks.

Effect: Heartripper Blade.name: Effect: Heartripper Blade
Effect: Heartripper Blade.description: Strikes with the heartripper blade inflict an additional [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6 negative damage} to living creatures.

Effect: Holy Steam Ball.name: Effect: Holy Steam Ball
Effect: Holy Steam Ball.description: Each use of the holy steam ball lasts for 1 hour and gives you a +2 item bonus to Will saving throws against possession effects from fiends and undead and effects from fiends and undead that cause the controlled condition.

Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.name: Effect: Hyldarf's Fang
Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.description: You call upon Hyldarf's power to gain the magic of a linnorm for a brief time. For 1 minute, you gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} as well as fire resistance 20.

Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol.description: For 1 minute, you look like a flaming corpse. During this time, you gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks and the immolation hand cannon becomes a +2 striking flaming hand cannon.

Effect: Impossible Cake.name: Effect: Impossible Cake
Effect: Impossible Cake.description: For 10 minutes after the meal, you gain a +2 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater).name: Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater)
Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater).description: For 30 minutes after the meal, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Impossible Cake (Major).name: Effect: Impossible Cake (Major)
Effect: Impossible Cake (Major).description: For 1 hour after the meal, you gain a +4 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

  • -2 penalty to initiative rolls
  • Treat Fortitude success as critical success

Unimplemented effects:

  • -2 penalty to Will saves

Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision, imprecise scent to a range of 30 feet, and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Major Five-Feather Wreath.name: Effect: Major Five-Feather Wreath
Effect: Major Five-Feather Wreath.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 10 to falling damage.

Effect: Malleable Mixture (Greater).description: You gain a +3 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 10 minutes.

Effect: Malleable Mixture (Lesser).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 1 minute.

Effect: Metuak's Pendant.name: Effect: Metuak's Pendant
Effect: Metuak's Pendant.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects that would make them confused, controlled, frightened, or stupefied.

Effect: Moderate Healer's Gel.name: Effect: Moderate Healer's Gel
Effect: Moderate Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 10 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Effect: Mudrock Snare (Failure).description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success).name: Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success)
Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy).name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make a request.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy.name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy.description: You gain a +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make a request.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).description: You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour as long as you continue to hold the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.

Effect: Oath of the Devoted.name: Effect: Oath of the Devoted
Effect: Oath of the Devoted.description:
Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. Choose a weapon or an unarmed Strike; your chosen attack deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} for the next 1 minute.

Effect: Ochre Fulcrum Lens.name: Effect: Ochre Fulcrum Lens
Effect: Ochre Fulcrum Lens.description:
You gain resistance 10 to mental damage and a +2 status bonus to saves against emotion effects.

  • Resistance to mental damage not implemented

Effect: Orchestral Brooch.name: Effect: Orchestral Brooch
Effect: Orchestral Brooch.description: You receive a +1 status bonus to your Performance check. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Parry.name: Effect: Parry
Effect: Parry.description: You position your weapon defensively, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Phoenix Flask.name: Effect: Phoenix Flask
Effect: Phoenix Flask.description: For 1 minute, you gain a Fly speed of 40 feet. The first time each round that you Fly (including to hover in place), you shed burning feathers that deal [[/r {3d4}[fire]]]{3d4 fire damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] at the end of your movement (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Phoenix Flask Fire Feathers|traits:consumable,evocation,fire,magical,potion|showDC:all] save).

Effect: Potency Crystal.name: Effect: Potency Crystal
Effect: Potency Crystal.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.ZCsksGf6NPUKz2Uw]{Potency Crystal}

The weapon becomes a +1 striking weapon for the rest of the turn, gaining a +1 item bonus to the attack roll and increasing the damage on a hit to two weapon damage dice.

Effect: Potion of Minute Echoes.name: Effect: Potion of Minute Echoes
Effect: Potion of Minute Echoes.description: For 1 minute after drinking this potion, you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to hear. In addition, each time you Seek, your hearing becomes a precise sense until the beginning of your next turn, allowing you to pinpoint creatures' locations and otherwise perceive the world in detail by listening to the sound of echoes.

Effect: Potion of Stable Form.name: Effect: Potion of Stable Form
Effect: Potion of Stable Form.description: For the next hour, you gain a +2 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +3 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb)
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A superb camouflage suit is fashioned from especially well-blended materials grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Private Workshop (Using for Craf.name: Effect: Private Workshop (Using for Crafting)
Effect: Private Workshop (Using for Craf.description: The workshop is stocked with mundane tools and can be used to Craft items appropriate to the workshop with a +1 item bonus, but you must supply any raw materials.

Effect: Protective Barrier.name: Effect: Protective Barrier
Effect: Protective Barrier.description:
Granted by Vontho's Golden Bridge

While the swirling rings of the vehicle don't fully cover the pilot, they offer incredible protection, magically maintaining the temperature within and ablating physical attacks. The pilot is protected from severe cold, severe heat, extreme cold, and extreme heat. The pilot also gains resistance 10 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

Effect: Qat (Stage 1).name: Effect: Qat (Stage 1)
Effect: Qat (Stage 1).description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Reflex saves.

If the hit with the rhino shot was a critical success, the target is knocked prone unless it critically succeeds at its save.

Effect: Ring of Torag.name: Effect: Ring of Torag
Effect: Ring of Torag.description: You gain resistance 5 against fire and a +1 status bonus on your AC or saving throw against the fire effect targeting you; these benefits end as soon as the fire effect is resolved.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to cold. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity).name: Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity)
Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to electricity. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Sonic).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to sonic. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb.name: Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb
Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb.description: As long as it is within 30 feet of you, the summoned creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC. If it ever moves farther than 30 feet from you, the sigil fades and the creature loses the status bonus to AC, even if it later comes within 30 feet of you again.

Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Greater).description:
Duration 1 hour

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +3 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Skyrider Sword.name: Effect: Skyrider Sword
Effect: Skyrider Sword.description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air for up to 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.name: Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.description:
While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: The damage cannot currently be made to automatically increase as the damage dice increase.

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.name: Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed Boost)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.description:
You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.

While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: the base +2 increase to damage is included in this effect. It cannot currently be made to automatically increase.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 20 feet and a +2 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 10 minutes.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet and a +3 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 hour.

Effect: Storm Chair.name: Effect: Storm Chair
Effect: Storm Chair.description: For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed, and adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch or hit you with an unarmed attack, take [[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6 electricity damage} each time. As normal, this applies to creatures who choose to touch you, not when you touch or attack another creature.

Note: This item originates from the 2022 Paizo April Fools Blog post.

Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate).description:
Granted by activating @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.evBPzM1VsuYcoenn]{Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)}.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 19.

Effect: Throne Card.name: Effect: Throne Card
Effect: Throne Card.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.gmg-srd.IJ3nFDu2YcoP6ynd]{Throne} from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Gyi4IVrAVJRPJF2s]{Deck of Many Things}

Effect: Topology Protoplasm.name: Effect: Topology Protoplasm
Effect: Topology Protoplasm.description: In this state, a creature that attempts a check to Squeeze uses the outcome one degree of success better than it rolls and can move its full Speed while Squeezing

Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure)
Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease, but the attempt critically failed. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Disease (Success).name: Effect: Treat Disease (Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison, but the attempt critically failed. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Success).name: Effect: Treat Poison (Success)
Effect: Treat Poison (Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement.name: Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement
Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement.description: The creatures gains a +4 status bonus to Deceptions checks to pass as their chosen age, and can add their level to this check as a proficiency bonus if untrained.

Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.name: Effect: Wand of Fey Flames
Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.description: For the duration of the spell, you can use the limning flames as a source for your magic. Creatures affected by your faerie fire must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or take a -2 status penalty to their Will saves against enchantment and illusions spells as long as they are affected by faerie fire. You can cast an enchantment or illusion spell on such a creature up to a distance twice the spell's normal range. If the spell has a range of touch, or doesn't have a range, it is unaffected by the increase in range from the faerie fire.

Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Greater).name: Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Greater)
Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Greater).description: You gain a +3 item bonus to your attack rolls with this weapon and to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Lesser).name: Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Lesser)
Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Lesser).description: You gain a +1 item bonus to your attack rolls with this weapon and to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Major).name: Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Major)
Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Major).description: You gain ta +4 item bonus to your attack rolls with this weapon and to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Moderate).name: Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Moderate)
Effect: War Blood Mutagen (Moderate).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to your attack rolls with this weapon and to Will saves against fear effects.
